description.english: Revive the Everlasting Cherry Blossom tree with your wishes.
Catch a few lucky sights and sensations while nursing a friend.
Catch your neighbor in a compromising position.
Deflect a curse onto the caster.
Get trapped alone with your underclassman.
Next time, your cousin should lock the door.
Follow Suginami's advice and meet a robot that runs on bananas.
Have your first kiss stolen by one of the heroines.
